name: Bridgedale Hike Explorer Heavyweight Expedition Crew Boot Socks - Unisex
categories: Explorer Heavyweight Endurance Crew Boot Sock
description: Seriously warm socks for seriously cold adventurers. With more warmth and comfort than any other Bridgedale socks, this is the ultimate pair for multi-day high mountain trips or winter expeditions.Blend of merino wool, wool and synthetics to wick moisture and give outstanding durability.Cushioning throughout for warmth and impact resistance.Supportive fit won't slip down or bunch up in your boots.Height is just right for boots.Insulated flat toe seams prevent cold spots.Elasticized arch and shaped heel cup hug your feet.Designed to return to original shape after every wash.
